outputs.output_descr:
The Project will improve the overall management of the water system facilities in the Rafah Governorate. For the Northern Governorate, the project will develop and improve the capacity of current water facilities for the municipalities of Beit Hanoun. The project has two expected outputs, they are:
Output 1: Access and availability of fresh water supply is improved to reach an average of 100-120 l/c/d
Output 2: Water infrastructure facilities are developed

project_descr: The Project includes the rehabilitation of the water supply facilities in the Rafah and North Governorates in the Gaza Strip, which would contribute to the improvement of the living conditions of around 300,000 inhabitatants.
project_title: Emergency Water Supply and Rehabilitation Programme
